summary: This document is an email correspondence from Tazia Smith to Paul Morris discussing financial notes related to BRL step-up notes and their current valuation. The email highlights a significant drop in value and seeks input on the situation, indicating a financial concern within Deutsche Bank's operations.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is a Director at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, discussing financial notes and their valuation in the email.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from Tazia Smith, who is being consulted about the financial situation.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is mentioned in the email as a CC'd recipient, indicating he is also involved in the discussion.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is mentioned in the email as the person whose view is being sought regarding the financial notes.

connections.description: Tazia Smith, as a Director, is communicating with Paul Morris regarding financial matters at Deutsche Bank.
Tazia Smith includes Vahe Stepanian in the email, indicating a professional relationship within Deutsche Bank.
Tazia Smith is seeking Jeffrey's opinion on the financial notes, indicating a consultative relationship.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: Tazia Smith is discussing BRL step-up notes that are marking down more than 20%.
The notes have a 15% barrier and are currently down 17% against the USD.
The final valuation dates for the notes are set for 3/20/14 and 4/14/14.
The email is classified as confidential under federal rules.
